posts.content:
Hi, i'm after a (preferably german) split screen. My ideal van would be one thats been welded and sprayed, but needs mechanical work / interior doing to it. (Im more confident with spanners than grinders and welding!) No panel vans or single/crewcabs
Closer to Plymouth, the better. Ideally i don't want to exceed £22k all in.
Looking forwards to seeing what people have,

Many thanks, Ben
Look in the For Sale section.......

Hi might be selling my super cool left hand drive dove blue 1961 sundial bus
Small back window model with small rear lights and bullet front indicators
No welding complete interior,slammed 1600cc engine drives lovely like a go cart
Straight rear axle,painted in zinc rust proof blue paint underside
AP alloy wheels which have been power coated silver
Never seen these wheels on any other bus
Front safari and rear safari,all side windows open out
Cool roof rack and ladder
Imported here in 2011 by myself from sunny USA and really never been on the VW scene
Only might be selling due to another project
New mot on this VW bus when I sale
Never driven in the rain in 5 years
Please email me only at
Jamie.chapman@hotmail.com
I live in dorset
Call me 01202 848290
£20 k will not go any lower
Have photos
Thank you
Jamie
